      • deleteAppointment

        public void deleteAppointment​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This event deletes the currently selected item from the database and observable list using a lambda to wait for a user response. The Lambda is a great tool for shortening code and increasing efficiency. The Lambda made listening for the user to select an option easier.
        Parameters:
        event - this handles the delete action event
